::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod sees that he almost took out Rex. Hot Rod's shocked that he got
so reckless.
"Oh my! I'm sorry Rex!"
Hot Rod flyes back to Kluster's position.
"Hot Rod, MAXIMIZE!" Hot Rod transformes back to his bot mode.
"I dont believe I almost killed him." Hot Rod pushes the thought out of
his head. And shoots Scourge..., yet again.
